name: Monster Smash Inc
description:
made in free version of construct 2

made for odd weekend game jam 15

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim and click to shoot

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

SHOOT ON THE  BIG THING MOVING ON THE ROOF TO DROP THE SMASHER!

enemie types

RED: walks, needs to smash

WHITE: bounces on walls, can't smash, die to bullets

ORANGE: jumps on you, needs to smash
